CONJUGATES: landscapes (n. plural) | landscaping (v. present participle) | landscaped (v. past tense/past participle)
ETYMOLOGY: From Dutch landschap 'tract of land, region', from land + -schap 'shape, condition' (cognate with Old English -scipe, modern English -ship). Originally referring to a picture representing scenery, then extended to the scenery itself.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun). Here, it's a common noun, can be countable or uncountable.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: All the visible features of an area of land, often considered in terms of their aesthetic appeal.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一块陆地上的所有可见特征，通常就其美学吸引力而言。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The rolling hills and dense forests formed a beautiful landscape.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 连绵起伏的丘陵和茂密的森林构成了一幅美丽的风景。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun). Here, it's a common noun, countable.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A picture representing an area of natural inland scenery.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 描绘自然内陆风光的画作或照片。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He specialized in landscapes, capturing the beauty of the national parks.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他专门画风景画，捕捉国家公园的美景。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: a verb that takes one or more objects.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To make a garden or other area of land more attractive by changing the design and planting trees, shrubs, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 通过改变设计和种植树木、灌木等方式，美化花园或其他土地。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: They hired a company to landscape their new backyard.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他们雇了一家公司来美化他们的新后院。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun). Here, it's a common noun, often used metaphorically.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A context or scenario, especially one that is complex and changes rapidly.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: （尤指复杂且变化迅速的）背景；局面。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The company must adapt to the rapidly changing technological landscape.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 该公司必须适应迅速变化的科技格局。
